snippet: Niraj Shah of Wayfair.com, a seller of home furnishings, says it has a place where anyone can post praise of their co-workers’ achievements.
abstract: Adam Bryant Corner Office column features interview with home furnishings retailer Wayfair.com co-founder and chief executive officer Niraj Shah discussing his career and management technique.
lead_paragraph: Niraj Shah of Wayfair.com, a seller of home furnishings, says it has a place where anyone can post praise of their co-workers’ achievements.

headline.print_headline: A Wall of Honor That’s Built by Your Colleagues
headline.seo: Niraj Shah of Wayfair.Com, on Employee Recognition
headline.main: A Wall of Honor That’s Built by Your Colleagues
